column6:
Home available to discriminating clientele for F-1 race. 

Beautiful 2/2 on 2.5 acres. Located 15 minutes to track, 20 minutes to downtown.
Airport, F-1 and house ALL east of Austin! 

you don't ever have to deal with Austin traffic if you choose!

$4,500.00 for the entire week!

Included: Full amenities, Laundry, Garage, Grill and grilling area,
2 decks, one covered and one with outdoor shower.
A private, wooded getaway of your own to enjoy. 

VERY clean, secure, safe country home with modern features- 

We also have connections to private transport to racetrack!
